channel.title: Hidden Services doesn't work
channel.description:
Hello. I'm trying to create TOR hidden service with Whonix Gateway + Whonix Workstation like there: **valyxp . wordpress . com /2020/07/09/how-to-host-hidden-services-on-tor-using-whonix/** or like there **www. whonix . org /wiki/Onion_Services** But totally it doesn't work: - TOR link doesn't open with TOR Browser - trying do "curl" with onion hostname and got "Tying 127.42.42.0:80..." inifinity waiting - trying do "curl http : / / 10.152.152.11 /" and got Connection refused.
Have tried make iptables -- flush + tcpdump port 80 on "workstation" and run "curl http : / / 10.152.152.11 /" => have infinity wainting and nothing in tcpdump logs. wtf ? what should i do ? help me plz, mans, thanks much! Good day!

tell me plz pack of questions/tests what u need to get info, i will do it, i want to resolve this case

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Onion_Services#Debugging

item.title: Hidden Services doesn't work
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can you setup a Tor onion service without Whonix? That’s a useful skill to master before attempting the same on Whonix.

See also:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Onion_Services#Debugging

Read full topic

item.title: Hidden Services doesn't work
item.dc:creator: mercury2014
item.description:
Hello. I’m trying to create TOR hidden service with Whonix Gateway + Whonix Workstation like there:
valyxp . wordpress . com /2020/07/09/how-to-host-hidden-services-on-tor-using-whonix/
or like there
www. whonix . org /wiki/Onion_Services
But totally it doesn’t work:

  • TOR link doesn’t open with TOR Browser
  • trying do “curl” with onion hostname and got “Tying 127.42.42.0:80…” inifinity waiting
  • trying do “curl http : / / 10.152.152.11 /” and got Connection refused.

Have tried make iptables – flush + tcpdump port 80 on “workstation” and run “curl http : / / 10.152.152.11 /” => have infinity wainting and nothing in tcpdump logs. wtf ? what should i do ? help me plz, mans, thanks much! Good day!

Read full topic
